basics.name: Deveraux Dietrich
basics.label: Developer | Programmer
basics.summary: I am a self taught developer/programmer, with a super keen eye for detail. Currently persuing Microsoft Azure and MongoDB Certifications.

highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee all website tasks
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone and in person
Assisted with project planning as per client requirements
Compiled final recon for clients and debrief after events
Arranged the time sheets and schedules of staff
Data entry responsibilities included collecting and entering data in databases and maintaining accurate records of valuable information.
Stock control responsibilities included receiving of goods, ensuring their correct quantities and quality, as well as ensuring that the goods were in good condition upon delivery.
